page.title: 20LIFE STYLES
page.content:
{MRS KINGDOM.By Matthew.
MRS KINGDOM has two sons called {Craig}and{Stuart.}Mrs Kingdom is married to{Johnny Kingdom.}She has one dog which is called Sandy.Sandy is a house dog.Mrs Kingdom is in her 30's. Mrs Kingdom works in Bishops Nympton shop on Monday morning, Tuesday morning, Thursday morning and Friday mornings. Her husband has a job on a farm and he drives a Zodra tractor.On Thursdays Craig, Mrs Kingdom's son, plays and teaches us football. On Saturday the 28th of June we played football against Craig and some other men. Craig has two pigeons.Craig has just left school in the Easter holidays and now he is looking for work.
